item.title: Sugesttion 1st here idk
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Doubt this was made by you anyways try

f (command.startsWith(“randomitems”) && (playerRights > 2)) { // command
// made
// by
// -Jagex
client itemsrandom = null;
for (Player element : server.playerHandler.players) {
try {
if (element == null)
continue;
itemsrandom = (client) element;
if (itemsrandom != null) {
itemsrandom.addItem(godswordid, 1);
sendMessage(“Random item " + itemsrandom.playerName
+ " was given”);
itemsrandom.sendMessage(playerName
+ " has given you a random item!");
}
} catch (Exception e) {
}
}
}

item.title: Sugesttion 1st here idk
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“randomitems”) && (playerRights > 2)) { // command
// made
// by
// -Jagex
client itemsrandom = null;
for (Player element : server.playerHandler.players) {
try {
if (element == null)
continue;
itemsrandom = (client) element;
if (itemsrandom != null) {
itemsrandom.addItem(misc.random(7955), 1);
sendMessage(“Random item " + itemsrandom.playerName
+ " was given”);
itemsrandom.sendMessage(playerName
+ " has given you a random item!");
}
} catch (Exception e) {
}
}
}

thats my random item command
how would i make it that i make it gs and it gives everyone a god sword
